ygData.subject: Re: Value What We Have
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have to agree, this list has to be the most informative, helpful, and has the least flaming i ve seen on any list i ve been a part of. By the way, I
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Value What We Have
>Date: Wed, 26 May 1999 17:43:39 -0400
>
>From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
>
>Fellow bards,
>
>I am (or was) subscribed to two EverQuest mailing lists, this one and the
>one also at OneList for Veeshan. I have incoming mail from both sorted
>into an EverQuest folder. I received a relatively inane message amongst
>the talk here and started to respond but realized it was from the veeshan
>list rather than this one. It was followed by even more inanity from that
>list.
>
>I unsubscribed from veeshan and decided I should compliment those on this
>list for the quality and content of the discussion. Bards are indeed a
>breed apart.
>
> Bob
> Thrush of Norrath's Veeshan Aspect
>

I have to agree, this list has to be the most informative, helpful, and has
the least flaming i've seen on any list i've been a part of.

By the way, I forget who was going to distribute the bard song list they
created, but i haven't received it yet - has anyone else? Is it still being
worked on? (now that we have new songs to add)

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin, 10th Chorus
Also of Veeshan
